mapper.select: SELECT successful_bid_no AS successfulBidNo ,auction_goods_no AS auctionGoodsNo ,bid_no AS bidNo ,successful_bid_price AS successfulBidPrice ,successful_bid_date AS successfulBidDate ,successful_bid_pay_end_date AS successfulBidPayEndDate ,successful_bid_cancel AS successfulBidCancel ,user_id AS userId FROM successful_bid WHERE auction_goods_no = #{auctionGoodsNo} LIMIT 0,1;
